directions: In large saucepan over medium heat, cook turkey, onion, garlic, carrot, basil and jalapeno until turkey is brown.  Pour in milk, reduce heat to low, and simmer until reduced by one-third.  Stir in wine and reduce again.  Pour in tomatoes and tomato paste and simmer 3 hours more.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.  Toss with tomato sauce and top with Parmesan.  Serve.
title: Turkey Bolognese Sauce
